name: Blueberry Strawberry Spiced Cooler/Smoothie
description: Blueberry Strawberry Spiced Cooler/Smoothie. Refreshing and delicious, vegan recipe.
recipeIngredient: 3-4  basil leaves or to taste (or 8-9 mint leaves)
2 tablespoons raw sugar or jaggery or sweetener of choice (or no sweetener for a mildly sweet smoothie)
1/4 teaspoon rock salt ((kala namak or 1 Tablespoon lemon juice))
1/4 teaspoon cinnamon powder ((I usually use cumin, which goes very well with sour fruits))

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep pan, add the strawberries and blueberries, mint or basil leaves, salt, sugar, rock salt or lemon juice, cinnamon powder, and water enough to cover the fruit.
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep pan, add the strawberries and blueberries, mint or basil leaves, salt, sugar, rock salt or lemon juice, cinnamon powder, and water enough to cover the fruit.

recipeInstructions.text: Boil for 10 minutes or till fruits soften.
recipeInstructions.name: Boil for 10 minutes or till fruits soften.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the mixture when cool and adjust salt, sugar and rock salt(rock salt adds a sour flavor).
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the mixture when cool and adjust salt, sugar and rock salt(rock salt adds a sour flavor).

recipeInstructions.text: Add more or less water according to preference. Keep it thick and smoothie like for a filling breakfast or add more water for a light drink.
recipeInstructions.name: Add more or less water according to preference. Keep it thick and smoothie like for a filling breakfast or add more water for a light drink.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve chilled topped with fresh mint leaves! Or add a splash of your favorite liquor in the evening!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve chilled topped with fresh mint leaves! Or add a splash of your favorite liquor in the evening!

keywords: fruit drink, healthy drink, vegan soft drink
